title: Ticket #6779: condor_history should have a -submitter option
description:
If you want to search for jobs from a given user using condor_history, and the username is a number, you are forced to use a -constraint query. With condor_q you can use -submitter instead. condor_history should also have a -submitter argument.

This request came from support ticket 93822
creator: johnkn
